item.title: EP 109 - Are The Sentinelese Guarding Alien Artifacts?
item.itunes:title: Are The Sentinelese Guarding Alien Artifacts?
item.description:
Do blind people see when they dream? And then we visit a small chain of islands off the coast of India. Who are the Sentinelese and are they guarding something that could change the course of history?

Patreon
https://www.patreon.com/user?u=18482113

MERCH STORE!!!
https://tinyurl.com/y8zam4o2

A recent study on how blind people dream reveals interesting information about the nature of nightmares.

Then we look at the primitive tribe known as the Sentinelese. Just last week they shot a man who tried to preach to them, and it is only the latest in a string of violent encounters with the tribe Are they just a group of prehistoric islanders who want to be left alone? Or are they guarding something?

Links:

How the Blind Dream

https://www.nationalgeographic.com/science/phenomena/2014/02/26/how-the-blind-dream/

Do Blind People See in Their Dreams?

https://www.psychologytoday.com/us/blog/dream-factory/201712/do-blind-people-see-in-their-dreams

American 'adventure tourist' killed by remote tribe after visiting protected Indian island

https://www.independent.co.uk/news/world/asia/american-tourist-killed-tribe-sentinel-island-john-allen-chau-death-bow-arrow-a8644196.html

The Stone Age People of North Sentinel Island

http://mentalfloss.com/article/23973/stone-age-people-north-sentinel-island

Sentinelese

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sentinelese

2004 Indian Ocean earthquake and tsunami

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2004_Indian_Ocean_earthquake_and_tsunami

Stone Age Culture Survives The Waves

http://www.nbcnews.com/id/6786476/ns/world_news-tsunami_a_year_later/t/stone-age-cultures-survive-tsunami-waves/

The Sentinelese

https://www.survivalinternational.org/tribes/sentinelese

How did the Sentinelese survive a tsunami hit???

https://forums.jetnation.com/topic/106387-how-did-the-sentinelese-survive-a-tsunami-hit/

SHOULD WE BE SEEKING OUT ALIENS ON EARTH?

https://www.syfy.com/syfywire/should-we-be-seeking-out-aliens-on-earth

Listen to the daily podcast anywhere you listen to podcasts!

------------------------------------------------
